评论详情: I am 5’8” and weigh 145 lbs and though I usually wear a medium I decided to buy a size large because I wanted a flowy look. I’m really impressed with the quality of fabric which is both soft with a slight sheen and is slightly thicker than I expected so no worries that it is see through. It is also very comfortable with no binding.  The contrast of the delicate floral pattern on the bottom half of the skirt against the black fabric is striking making the pattern really stand out. Also the stitching at the waist hits me exactly in the right spot and is flattering to my waistline.  I’m so happy with the overall look which is feminine, fashionable and fun and has a lot of versatility from dressed up with accessories or dressed down for every day wear.  I’m so happy with my purchase and highly recommend this dress!

The fabric is a sensory nightmare (it snags on your fingers like microfiber, feels slimy somehow, and just overall feels awful), the seams are crooked (including the waist seam which is gathered unevenly, creating a bizarre and unpleasant appearance), and the dress does not fit like the picture. It hangs and makes you look super square and awful. You get what you pay for, I guess. Definitely do NOT recommend

评论概述: Fit is poor and the print looks a bit cheap
评论详情: I almost sent this back (actually I still may). The fit isn’t right in two important ways: the seam hits me right under the bust, not in a flattering empire-waistline kind of way but in a way that makes my whole upper body look thick. and second, the armholes are too big and I don’t sew, so I’m not going to fix them. The print is nice, but much cruder than in the photo. I’d never have bought this if I’d seen it in person first. All that being true, it’s comfortable, and the hem sits perfectly at the knee, a good length for my height. I should mention I’m 5’2”so if you’re taller, plan accordingly!

评论详情: I found the dress SO high-waisted (almost true empire) that I wondered if I'd somehow ordered a maternity version. Also, the sleeve holes were so large (I'd ordered a small) that they fed into my suspicion that this was really some sort of maternity dress, since they were designed to accommodate a substantially larger bust than my 34A. This was especially disappointing, as I'd used the feature to see what the dress would look like on a model with my approximate body shape, and it looked fine.  I loved everything else about the dress - the pockets, the comfort and slight stretchiness. If you're pregnant enough to show, this might be the perfect dress for you!

评论概述: Super comfy while still being a bit fitted
评论详情: This is a very cheery summer dress that is perfect for times you want to feel a bit dressier without overheating. I love the pockets which lay flat and do.not make those awkward bulges at the hip as some dresses do. It has washed like a dream. I do line dry so can't speak to how a dryer may affect the fabric. Easy on and off too which is a plus for arthritic joints. I have Three of this style now and hot weather is conquered with style.
This was a gift to my sister’s granddaughter.  She loved the color and it fit perfectly.

So this looks nice. It's comfy. But you get what you pay for. It's cheaper fabric. Lots of loose threads right out of the package. The pockets, while nice, are smaller than I expected, a phone almost barely can fully fit inside. I ordered an XL because I have a large bust. The arm holes were HUGE on me, but the rest of the dress fit well. I can sew so I took them in and it looks nice now. Had I looked at it more closely before washing it, I may have returned it. But for the price, after I altered it, I do like it as a casual comfy dress
